content: fibonacci real name leonardo of pisa was the first mathematician to publish the sequence but it originated in india quite a long while before that i am not a mathematician and you don t have to be one either it s just a sequence of numbers that is particularly useful in creating an interesting stripe pattern for robby s afghan i used red heart acrylic in paddy green and white 3 skeins of each robby is a jets fan yes i know but give him a break he s only 5
